Start creating, taking, tracking, and sharing corporate training courses.

Coursetto is a mobile ready, sharable, learning management system that empowers you or anyone else in your company to create, purchase, distribute, and track online training.

Request a beta code



Request Demo

Course Creation

Anyone Can Create Courses

Allow anyone in your company to create and manage courses, or restrict permissions where appropriate.

Creating custom content is a breeze on desktop and mobile.

Subscriptions

Pricing is based on number of employees enrolled and the number of private courses you need to distribute:

Create a custom company structure

The Old Way

Tracking employee course progress in a large company structure can be difficult with other out-of-the-box solutions.

The Coursetto Way

Create your company's organization tree any way you need. Place managers in charge of their own tier to create micro training environments.

And You Get Graphs!

Assign managers and employees to their own tiers and delegate training. Then track progress across all tiers.

Course Marketplace

Pay per user course taken

No subscription necessary

No time to build a course and just need something standard? Then head over to the course marketplace.

Course Distribution

Your company structure is on the right. Watch your price fluctuate as you turn off departments that do not need to take the course you are adding. The price is just an estimate of credits needed to be purchased. Credits are only used when a user actually takes a course. Users get an unlimited amount of times to take a course. Once purchased the course will appear for any "on" departments.
